title: The Shark
description:
You’re ten years old, and your father’s just passed away. You decide, the only way to avoid your pain is to keep moving forward, no matter what. And your strategy works – until you start to feel less and less … human.

Hosted by Robbie Daymond.

Listen ad-free on Wondery+ here

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
